main.name: Le Tan Luc
main.description: I am an enthusiastic, self-motivated, reliable, responsible and hardworking person. I am a mature team worker and adaptable to all challenging situations. I am able to work well both in a team environment as well as using own initiative. I am able to work well under pressure and adhere to strict deadlines.
main.bio: I do the work I do because I love it. Keep simple, everything possible. I like the industry. I like the people I meet. I like to talk shop. I embrace the nerd. I like to make the web a better place. Hopefully we cross paths in the real world someday and we can make it a better place together.
main.contactmessage: I am a senior fullstack web developer. If you feel interested in my little CV, please get in touch with me via email.

address.street: 184/25 Bui Van Ngu, Hiep Thanh Ward, District 12

resume.skillmessage: Over 5 years of experiences in software engineering. 3 years+ of experience .Net developer, experiences on working with ASP.NET - applications from small to big scale with full understanding of most of the software development process models: waterfall, SRUM.

education.description: I was teached about technical with programming language such as: Java, C#, ASP.NET. About web applition is: HTML, JS, Javascript, CSSS. And tool: MSSQL, Netbean, Visual Studio, Notepad++, SVN.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
